Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Category.Name: Trigger
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the trigger features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the trigger features.

Category.Name: FileAccessControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the File Access control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the File Access control features.

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the device control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the device control features.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: CommonFeature.Format of the pixels provided by the device.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Converter.Name: WaveDelay
Converter.ToolTip: External trigger delay time, unit: us, step: 0.1us
Converter.Description: External trigger delay time, unit: us, step: 0.1us

Converter.Name: JitterTime
Converter.ToolTip: External trigger jitter time, unit: us, step: 0.1us
Converter.Description: External trigger jitter time, unit: us, step: 0.1us

Converter.Name: PulseWidth
Converter.ToolTip: External trigger pulse width. Only works when ExternalTriggerMode is 0, unit: us, step: 0.1us
Converter.Description: External trigger pulse width. Only works when ExternalTriggerMode is 0, unit: us, step: 0.1us

Converter.Name: InternalFrameFrequency
Converter.ToolTip: Internal frame frequency, only works when ExternalTriggerMode is 0.
Converter.Description: Internal frame frequency, only works when ExternalTriggerMode is 0.

Converter.Name: InternalExposureTime
Converter.ToolTip: Internal exposure time, only works when ExternalTriggerMode is 0, unit: us, step: 0.1us.
Converter.Description: Internal exposure time, only works when ExternalTriggerMode is 0, unit: us, step: 0.1us.

Integer.Name: ExternalTriggerMode
Integer.ToolTip: External trigger mode, 0: setting pulse width, 1: follow external pulse width.
Integer.Description: External trigger mode, 0: setting pulse width, 1: follow external pulse width.

Enumeration.Name: BitShiftSelect
Enumeration.ToolTip: bit shift choose provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: bit shift choose provided by the device.

Enumeration.Name: SelectArgumentMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the argument mode in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the argument mode in the device.

Enumeration.Name: FileSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target file in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target file in the device.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Open
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Close
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Reads the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Reads the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Writes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Writes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Delete
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Deletes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Deletes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

Enumeration.Name: FileOpenMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This mode selects read-only open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects read-only open mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This mode selects write-only open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects write-only open mode.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadWrite
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This mode selects read and write open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects read and write open mode.

Command.Name: FileOperationExecute
Command.ToolTip: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.
Command.Description: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Represents the file operation execution status.
Enumeration.Description: Represents the file operation execution status.

Integer.Name: FileSize
Integer.ToolTip: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.
Integer.Description: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: The GenICam port through which the Device module is accessed.
Port.Description: The GenICam port through which the Device module is accessed.
